verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I looked over Jordan
and what did I see,
Coming for to carry me home.
A band of angels
coming after me,
Coming for to carry me home.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
CHORUS:
Swing low, sweet chariot,
Coming for to carry me home.
Swing low, sweet chariot,
Coming for to carry me home.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
If you get there before I do,
Coming for to carry me home.
Tell all my friends
I'm a-coming too,
Coming for to carry me home.
